title: Rain (Version 2)
creator: William Somerset Maugham
description: LibriVox recording of Rain (Version 2), by William Somerset Maugham. Read by Linda Hogan. Rain charts the moral disintegration of a missionary attempting to convert a Pacific island prostitute named Sadie Thompson. (Introduction by an excerpt from Wikipedia) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; fiction; rain; william somerset maugham
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
